description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Develop strategies along with DOS to expand sales into new markets and increase business in existing markets.
              
              - Create annual sales and marketing plan and budget for assigned market.
              
              - Organize and attend events such as conferences, seminars, receptions and exhibitions;
              
              - Identify and contact new potential agents and tour operators.
              
              - Develop and cultivate good relations with partners and clients.
              
              - Respond to and follow up new agent enquiries.
              
              - Supervise B2B travel correspondences by email of Inbound Department on important occasions (new accounts, prod of brochures, more demanding agents, etc.).
              
              - Making sales calls to introduce company’s services to prospective clients.
              
              - Analyze trends and needs of specific markets, development of new tours and product ideas.
              
              - Design exciting & competitive Inbound tour packages & calculate costing.
              
              - To coordinate with group organizers for GIT group tours.
              
              - To understand the regulatory and compliance issues in relation to running the inbound activities.
              
              - Report to DOS.

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * Responsibilities:
              
              - Develop strategies along with DOS to expand sales into new markets and increase business in existing markets.
              
              - Create annual sales and marketing plan and budget for assigned market.
              
              - Organize and attend events such as conferences, seminars, receptions and exhibitions;
              
              - Identify and contact new potential agents and tour operators.
              
              - Develop and cultivate good relations with partners and clients.
              
              - Respond to and follow up new agent enquiries.
              
              - Supervise B2B travel correspondences by email of Inbound Department on important occasions (new accounts, prod of brochures, more demanding agents, etc.).
              
              - Making sales calls to introduce company’s services to prospective clients.
              
              - Analyze trends and needs of specific markets, development of new tours and product ideas.
              
              - Design exciting & competitive Inbound tour packages & calculate costing.
              
              - To coordinate with group organizers for GIT group tours.
              
              - To understand the regulatory and compliance issues in relation to running the inbound activities.
              
              - Report to DOS.
              
              * Requirements:
              
              - Diploma/Degree in any field of studies
              
              - At least 3 to 5 years of working experiences in inbound business operation / business development in travel industry.
              
              - Excellent knowledge about all tourism related services (culture, leisure, MICE, trekking, eco tourism, festival, tribal etc)
              
              - Fluent in English/ Japanese/ Chinese/ Korean both written and spoken. Further languages are highly appreciated.
              
              * Benefits:
              
              - To enjoy the full range of social insurance, health insurance under the provisions of the State.
              
              - Annual Leave: 12 days /year.
              
              - Work in a friendly and professional environment.
              
              - Income: Attractive salary and bonus, dependable on experience, revenue and work performance.
              
              * Interested candidates can send your CV/ Resume to:
              
              - Skype: trang.tms
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
